members.name: TryDecodePngAsync
members.summary: Attempts to decode a QR or barcode from PNG bytes asynchronously.
members.signature: static Task<CodeGlyphDecoded> TryDecodePngAsync(Stream stream, Nullable<BarcodeType> expectedBarcode, bool preferBarcode, QrPixelDecodeOptions qrOptions, CancellationToken cancellationToken, BarcodeDecodeOptions barcodeOptions)

members.summary: Attempts to decode a QR or barcode from a PNG file asynchronously.

members.summary: Attempts to decode all QR codes and (optionally) a 1D barcode from PNG bytes asynchronously.
